mapper.select: SELECT C.ROLE_CODE, A.SYSTEM_CODE, A.SYSTEM_NAME, A.DB_SID, CASE WHEN B.IF_YMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN '0' WHEN B.IF_YMD != TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN B.IF_YMD ELSE '2' END AS INTERLOCKING_STATUS FROM TCKSYS A, (SELECT DB_NAME, MAX(IF_YMD) AS IF_YMD FROM TCKHIS GROUP BY DB_NAME) B, TCKRMS C WHERE A.DB_SID = B.DB_NAME (+) AND A.GROUP_CODE = C.GROUP_CODE AND A.SYSTEM_CODE = C.SYSTEM_CODE AND C.ROLE_CODE IN ('002', '003', '004') ORDER BY C.ROLE_CODE, A.SYSTEM_CODE

SELECT SERVICE_NAME, IP || ':' || SSL_PORT AS IP_PORT, SSL_ENDDATE, TRUNC(TO_DATE(SSL_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') -SYSDATE, 0) AS EXPIRATION_DATE, SUBSTR(SSL_INFO, INSTR(SSL_INFO, 'CN=', 1)+3) SSL_INFO, REPLACE(DOMAIN, 'DNS:', '') AS DOMAIN FROM TCKWEB ORDER BY SSL_ENDDATE
